TikTokUser.title: TikTokUser
TikTokUser.description: Represents a TikTok user who is using the monetization bridge.

id.description: Unique identifier for the TikTokUser entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

tiktokUsername.description: The TikTok username provided by the user.

verificationCode.description: Verification code entered by the user for the admin to check.

phoneNumberId.description: The ID of the chosen PhoneNumber entity.

phoneNumber.description: The chosen phone number string, denormalized for easy display.

isVerified.description: Whether the admin has manually confirmed/approved the user.

PhoneNumber.title: PhoneNumber
PhoneNumber.description: Represents a US phone number available for users to select.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PhoneNumber entity.

isAvailable.description: Indicates whether the phone number is currently available for assignment.

region.description: The geographical region of the phone number (e.g., West Coast, Northeast).

state.description: The US state associated with the phone number.

benefits.description: A list of advantages or positive aspects of choosing this number.

disadvantages.description: A list of potential drawbacks or negative aspects of choosing this number.

bonuses.description: A list of special offers or bonuses associated with this number.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an admin user who manages the website and control panel.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Admin entity.

username.description: The admin's username for logging into the control panel.

definition.description: Stores TikTok user data pending admin approval.

params.name: tiktokUserId
params.description: The unique identifier for the TikTok user.

definition.description: Stores US phone numbers and their availability status.

params.name: phoneNumberId
params.description: The unique identifier for the phone number.

definition.description: Stores admin user credentials for control panel access.

params.name: adminId
params.description: The unique identifier for the admin user.
